DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective determine efficacy AMR101 ( ethyl icosapentate ) compare placebo lower high fast triglyceride level patient high risk cardiovascular disease fast triglyceride level ≥ 200 < 500 mg/dL .
DOC.brief_title: Effect AMR101 ( Ethyl Icosapentate ) Triglyceride ( Tg ) Levels Patients Statins With High Tg Levels ( ≥ 200 < 500 mg/dL )
DOC.criteria: Men woman , age > 18 Fasting triglyceride ≥200 mg/dL < 500 mg/dL LDLC ( low density lipoprotein cholesterol ) ≥40 mg/dL < 100mg/dL High risk Coronary heart disease On stable dose statin ( atorvastatin , rosuvastatin simvastatin ) Provide write informed consent authorization protect health information disclosure Women pregnant lactating , plan become pregnant Use nonstatin lipidaltering drug stop include fibrates , niacin , fish oil product contain omega3 fatty acid dietary supplement potential lipidaltering effect History bariatric surgery currently weight loss drug Uncontrolled hypertension ( BP > 160/100 ) HIV infection treatment HIVprotease inhibitor , cyclophosphamide , isotretinoin Consumption 2 alcoholic beverage per day History cancer ( except disease free > 5 year OR history basal squamous cell skin cancer ) Participation another clinical trial involve investigational agent last 30 day Other parameter assess study center ensure eligibility study .
